ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks - helps to know that it s not just me. We zone in, run by the zone campers who are typcially slacking off and kill the last 2 of the first six froogs.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks - helps to know that it's not 'just me.'

We zone in, run by the zone campers who are typcially slacking off and kill
the last 2 of the first six froogs. Then open the door and down the ramp.
Kill the 3 at the bottom of the ramp. When we got the Shroom's up, it was 3
wizard froogs and with 2 enchanters in the raid, very likely that one
charmed a wiz as they do make good pets. After CR, there was a bug and 2
froogs at the ramp base. We kill whatever is there and wait for the
patroller to go away. Then if we are heading for the pyramid, we typically
cross to the far side and train-pull the first few back off the bridge
proper and towards the first bugs.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <jhenders@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 12:05 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC


> On Thu, May 25/00, Benoit St-Hilaire <bsthilai@...> wrote:
> >
> > We went in Sebilis in the firsts week of Kunark and, that Mushroom poped
on us at the bridge. So it is not
> > a patch effect, it is just poor testing from Verant. If it ever happen
to your group again, i would
> > suggest /bug'ing it.
>
> Heh. Like /bug does anything. We'd been in there quite a bit and hadn't
> seen this before the patch. In our case, it wasn't one mushroom, it was
> 10 ilis and krup frogs. One shroom we could have handled.
> >
> > Now we just make sure we don't fight/stay at the bridge.
> >
>
> If you're headed towards the scarabs area, where do you pull to before
> moving up? We don't stay at the bridge area, but we usually pull to
> there to clear for the next stage of advancing deeper.
